funspotr 0.0.4

Package index

Spotting functions and/or packages

Functions for identifying functions or packages in a single file or collection of files.

spot_funs()
Spot Functions
spot_pkgs()
Spot Packages
spot_tags()
Spot Tags
spot_funs_files() spot_pkgs_files()
Spot Packages or Functions in dataframe of Paths

List files

Functions for listing the files in a repository or other location.

list_files_github_repo()
List Files in Github Repo
list_files_github_gists()
List Github Gists of User
list_files_wd()
List Files in Working Directory

Helpers and others

Helpers for manipulating data or plotting as well as variations on the core spotting functions.

network_plot()
funspotr Network Plot
unnest_results()
Unnest Results
check_pkgs_availability()
Check Packages Availability
spot_pkgs_used()
Spot Packages Used
spot_funs_custom()
Spot Functions Custom
spot_pkgs_from_description()
Spot package dependencies from DESCRIPTION file
str_detect_r_docs()
String Detect R or Rmarkdown or Quarto File endings
